author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Indie and self-pub has been exploding lately. Whether it be Ryan Cahill, Rob J. Hayes, M.L. Wang, Michael R. Fletcher, or anyone else, the gap between indie and trad is closing rapidly. If you’re interested in dipping a toe and trying an indie—but also want something a bit slimmer—I’ve put together a list of eight […]

The post 8 Indie Grimdark Novella Recommendations appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: 8 Indie Grimdark Novella Recommendations
